personal.name: Ardiansyah
personal.title: AI Engineer & Computer Engineering Student
personal.bio: I'm a passionate AI Engineer and Computer Engineering student at Universitas Negeri Makassar, currently in my 6th semester. My journey in technology began with curiosity about how machines can learn and make intelligent decisions. I specialize in developing AI solutions including computer vision systems, optical mark recognition, and intelligent recommendation algorithms that solve real-world problems.
personal.philosophy: I believe that artificial intelligence should augment human capabilities and solve practical problems. My approach focuses on creating efficient, accurate, and beneficial AI systems that can make a positive impact on education, business, and society through innovative applications of machine learning and computer vision.

achievements.title: AI Research Project
achievements.description: Led research on computer vision applications

career_objectives: Develop intelligent systems for education and business automation
Advance computer vision applications in real-world scenarios
Build scalable AI solutions with high accuracy and efficiency
Contribute to innovative AI research and development
Bridge the gap between academic AI research and practical applications

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Constantly exploring new technologies and approaches

values.title: Ethics
values.description: Building responsible and transparent AI systems

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: Working together to solve complex challenges
